meanings.definition: The teachings or practices of tantric philosophy.
meanings.sent1: She delved into the ancient tantrisms to find inner peace.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to various tantrisms.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends jokingly referred to their inside jokes as tantrisms.
meanings.sent4: His art was a beautiful tantrism, blending colors and emotions seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The guru's words on tantrisms resonated deeply with the students.

meanings.definition: A collection of tantric beliefs or principles.
meanings.sent1: The book explored the different tantrisms practiced in the region.
meanings.sent2: She found solace in the ancient tantrisms passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The family heirloom was believed to hold mystical tantrisms within its pages.
meanings.sent4: His music was a unique blend of traditional melodies and modern tantrisms.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed artifacts related to the historical tantrisms of the culture.
